ai-patthana23.36:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles means to the extent of the Dhamma.
ai-patthana23.36:0.3_0: body, speech, and mind are past,
ai-patthana23.36:1.1_0: Not doing currently, skilled in the past, the future, or the present.
ai-patthana23.36:1.1_1: This is the reason why the same thing ...
ai-patthana23.36:2.1_0: Not doing the teaching, no cause or condition. Their sense is unskillful, with no cause or condition.
ai-patthana23.36:2.1_1: This is the reason why the same thing ...
